result.description: How to create a simple and delicious Espresso Martini. Fill a shaker with ice cubes. Add all ingredients. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
result.story: The famous Espresso Martini is a top drink and a classic Kahlua cocktail. Invented by the famous late bartender Dick Bradsell, as a peculiar request from a British top model in his London bar in 1984. The Espresso Martini is a cocktail with a story, a history and a legacy.
result.name: Espresso Martini
